item.title: Column 23 Beckenham Road, Beckenham, 18th February
item.description:
Only one LED unit of the two unit lantern is working (same situation as other lamps reported in this street recently). Sorry but as driving along at night I spot yet another one of these double units where one isn’t working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80-98, Beckenham Road, Elmers End, Greater London

item.title: Two manhole covers wobbling and rocking very noisily in street, 18th February
item.description:
The manhole covers have come loose and rock quite violently and loudly every time a vehicle passes over them. I’m concerned one will give way completely and badly damage a car/people. It’s also a bus route (W5) so that’s another risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16-28, Hornsey Lane, Archway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface breaking up, 18th February
item.description:
The road surface on Crown lane spur has degraded so badly, the continual digging up, patching and repairing of potholes has left the road a mess... This section of road needs to be resurfaced as a mater of priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Lane Spur, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple car park lights not working, 18th February
item.description:
There are about 8 car park stree lights that are not working in and around Gunyard Mews. These stopped working in August 2023. It is still a mystery who is resposible to repair the lights. I have had 2 attemped vechicle break in over the last two years which I believe the lack of street lighting has harboured vechicle crime becuse it is so dark at night in the car park

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Berber Parade, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous Potholes, 18th February
item.description:
Numerous potholes on this section of Petts Wood road, some are already marked for repair others are not. Some of these are big and I almost had an accident today as i went to swerve a large and deep pothole I noticed a motorcycle was in the process of overtaking me (at minimal distance). As i noticed the bike, I didnt swerve the pothole, so hit it, but avoided hitting the bike. It was a fortunate near miss. Please can we get these fixed before there is an accident! The rather amusing thing, what was following me, only a Riney road repair lorry! However, there are so many big potholes around it becomes dangerous as its another thing to draw the drivers attention!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of deep potholes throughout the centre of the junction., 18th February
item.description:
As a pedestrian waiting to cross potholes causing tarmac chips and dirty water at our legs. On the bus the surface of the road is bone shaking. As a driver concerned about damage from holes and from other cars swerving to avoid holes sometimes into oncoming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Crown Dale, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant car horns at Mare Street/Graham Road junction, 18th February
item.description:
The cars making a left hand turn from Mare street into Graham Road are constantly beeping their horns following the closure to car traffic through to Amhurst Road. The noise is incessant from morning to night and started since the new lights and road layou
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights at start of Wensum Place, 18th February
item.description:
At the start of Wensum Place, outside no.2 corner house. The street light on the side of the house has stopped working completely and the one opposite (side of the green) is flashing constantly when on.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wensum Place, Hayes, Greater London
